attributes.title: Read this if you wanna make sense of this app Lollll🤣🤣☺️☺️
attributes.review: WTH!!! Obama didn’t have to create a app to support his campaign.So why is he littlery wasting money on a app that doesn’t even work!!! You shouldn’t have to pay to be the president honestly.The app is lagging all the time.Make me think he’s on a budget cus he maybe getting poor just in case he loses!!!!pop off sis this going to be a horrible 4 years if either Trump or Biedon wins.Get ready for a roller coaster ride !!!!🖤🖤🖤🖤🖤.  ✌🏽

attributes.title: This app is so BADDDD
attributes.review: I mean like it’s an app called Trump first of all all i can think about it oompa loompa oopadeedo like what? It was so glitchy and such bad quality and the man who made it is a mysoginist, rapist, homophobic, racist, who doesn’t care about anyone but himself literally how does this app store support him having a app and how do people let him lead us CORRUPTION! Nasttyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy!

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review:
This app is horrible it took two weeks to download
It is literally so slow it kicks me off every time I try to use it and then when I tried to open it it powered my phone off for some reason and it came with this thing that said scam warningIGive it -1000 285000,000 out of 10 and it’s so slow when I use it when I did get to use it it was loading for like an hour when I try to open it

attributes.title: This app sucks😡
attributes.review: This took 365 days to download😡😡😡😡 And as soon as it did it crashed😱 And won’t open😖 So now I can’t even see what this app has to offer😭 So “sad”🥺🙄
